author: echo_alice
content: This is the second time where I fixed a bug in my light client code, then see you made a PR to the spec that would have fixed it!  Your PRs are great dood

author: etan_status
content:
There are some test vectors that you can use to cross-check your implementation vs the spec reference. 
From `consensus-specs` repo root, use this command to generate vectors: `rm -rf ../consensus-spec-tests && make gen_light_client`.
Format of the emitted files is described here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/tests/generators/light_client
